name: Heavanly Honey Chicken
description: This is an addictively good sweet & sticky chicken that you'll make again & again.  (Click link for Details)
ingredients: Serves 4 people: 4 Chicken breasts, 1 Litre of Orange juice, 1 Garlic clove, 2 Tablespoons of honey: Directions: lay filets in dish cover with finely chopped garlic, drizzle over honey, cover with OJ, Leave to marinade for 4 hours.
